TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataListItemEventHandler(object sender, DataListItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataListItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataListItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataListItemEventArgs)
public delegate void DataListItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataListItemEventArgs ^ e);
type DataListItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataListItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用于处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 控件中的项时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 当 控件中的项被数据绑定到源时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an item in the control is data bound to a source. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件定义处理程序，以计算 控件中项的价格。The following example demonstrates how to define a handler for the event to calculate the price of items in a control. 此示例以声明方式指定事件处理程序，并为 控件上的 特性设置事件处理程序。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, setting the event handler for the attribute on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound/CS/datalistitemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound/VB/datalistitemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到 `Page_Load` 方法中的 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound2/CS/datalistitemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemDataBound2/VB/datalistitemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]
